name: @nypl/nypl-core-objects
description: Exposes objects from NYPL/nypl-core as easy-to-work-with datastructures

scripts.deploy-qa: npm run build-mappings && aws s3 cp output s3://nypl-core-objects-mapping-qa/ --recursive --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=300 --profile nypl-digital-dev
scripts.deploy-production: npm run build-mappings && aws s3 cp output s3://nypl-core-objects-mapping-production/ --recursive --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=300 --profile nypl-digital-dev

author: The New York Public Library
